==Steps for the TokBox Developer API==
====1. Check out sample applications + source code====
  * [http://sandbox.tokbox.com/sampleApp/generator Call Generator]
    * `[`[http://sandbox.tokbox.com/assets/API/videoparty.zip source code]`]`

  * [http://sandbox.tokbox.com/sampleApp/guestbook Video GuestBook]  
    * `[`[http://sandbox.tokbox.com/assets/API/weddingbook.zip source code]`]`

  * [http://code.google.com/p/tokboxapi/wiki/SampleApplications All sample applications]

====2. Get Your *Sandbox* Developer Key====
Get a Sandbox developer key to develop and test applications against our Sandbox environment: 
  * [http://sandbox.tokbox.com/view/platformkeys Sandbox Environment TokBox API Key Request Form]

====3. Download the SDK for your preferred language====
  * Please visit our [http://code.google.com/p/tokboxapi/downloads/list SDK Download] page
  * Interested in another language? Let us know on the [http://groups.google.com/group/tokbox-developers TokBox developers mailing list]

==What's Next?==
You may find the following developer resources helpful:
  * [http://code.google.com/p/tokboxapi/wiki/MainPage API Documentation]
  * [http://groups.google.com/group/tokbox-developers Developer Mailing List]
  * [http://code.google.com/p/tokboxapi/wiki/PHPTutorial Tutorial]
====Release!====
Once your application has matured, request a Production key by e-mailing us at <a href="mailto:bizdev@tokbox.com">bizdev@tokbox.com</a>
